sect2.title: Syntax
sect2.synopsis: <!ELEMENT configure (param*)> <!ATTLIST configure base CDATA #IMPLIED command CDATA #IMPLIED>
sect2.para: This element occurs in the elements alfs, else, stage. and then

sect2.title: Description
sect2.para: The element configure is used to describe a command configure.
When processing the element, one executes the command ./configure with the parameters specified.
The attribute base allows to specify the directory in which the command is executed.
The attribute command allows to specify the command if one doesn't want to use the default "./configure".
